snippet.title: Assassin's Creed The Rebel Collection: Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Experience the award-winning Assassin’s Creed® franchise anywhere and anytime. Assassin’s Creed®: The Rebel Collection offers two action-packed games and all past single-player DLC. Become the most feared pirate in the Caribbean in Assassin’s Creed® IV: Black Flag then transform into the ultimate assassin hunter in Assassin’s Creed® Rogue.

Available on December 6th 2019

Learn more about Assassin's Creed franchise and Assassin's Creed The Rebel Collection:

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/assassinscreed
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/assassinscreed_uk/
